content.question: The map above represents what kind of projection?

choices.label: A Mercator projection with distorted land areas
A planar projection with diverging lines at the poles
A homolosine projection with continuity of landmasses
A Robinson projection with distortions at the equator
A gnomonic projection with distortions of bodies of water

content.answer: A Mercator projection with distorted land areas

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify the different types of information presented in visual sources.
